import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux' import {newBourbon} from '../actions/BourbonsActions' import { allCategories } from '../actions/CategoriesActions' class NewBourbon extends Component { state = { name: "", distillery: "", proof: null, aged: null, flavornotes: "", pairing: "", category_id: null } // fetched all categories to state on mount so accessible in form selections input componentDidMount(){ this.props.allCategories() } handleInputChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.id]: event.target.value }); } handleOnSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); this.props.newBourbon(this.state) this.setState({ name: "", distillery: "", proof: "", aged: "", flavornotes: "", pairing: "", category_id: "" }) this.props.history.push('/bourbons') } render() { return(

Add Your Label Here

) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { categories: state.categories.categories } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, {newBourbon, allCategories})(NewBourbon);
